description:
The following methods make similar api calls using RetrievePropertiesEx and hence can be consolidated to avoid code repetition :- 

1. get_object_properties --> retrievePropertiesEx()
2. get_objects --> retrievePropertiesEx()
3. get_properties_for_collection_of_objects --> retrievePropertiesEx()

Suggestion :-
get_object_properties/get_objects ---> get_properties_for_collection_of_objects --> retrievePropertiesEx()
title: VMware: Refactor methods in vim_util to re-use common functionality

comments.content:

comments.content: This looks like an abandoned piece of work level tracking, marking as Invalid because the patch is abandoned
